text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Consultation
& Scope[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-555555″ text_size=”h4″ text_weight=”400″ text_height=”fontheight-111852″ uncode_shortcode_id=”179492″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Let’s meet on-site and get an understanding of your property’s unique attributes and what opportunities can be unlocked.

At this initial meeting we want to hear about your vision. We will then map out a realistic budget and design proposal to help you understand the possibilities.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_separator sep_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”323519″ sep_color_type=”uncode-palette” el_width=”100″ el_height=”0.25″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”109666″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”153957″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-113466″ text_size=”h4″ uncode_shortcode_id=”177524″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]We Provide[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”2/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”351970″][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”217344″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

  • A chance to meet with James Moore and Georgia Finnan who will act as your primary point of contact throughout the process.
  • Dedicated time to discuss your family’s specific requirements and understand how you wish to live in your new family home.
  • Opportunities to collaboratively workshop ideas, inclusions, design intent and preliminary budget.

  • Opportunities to collaborate directly with Ric and the design team throughout the design process.
  • Design concepts presented in 2D, 3D and even as a fly-through presentation, enabling you to accurately envision the proportions, angles and features of your future home.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_single_image media=”293″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”780758″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”50″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-118631″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”446375″ back_color_type=”uncode-palette” row_name=”step03″][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_single_image media=”341″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”146824″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”544893″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”109666″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”160638″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-113466″ text_size=”h4″ uncode_shortcode_id=”159669″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Step 03[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”2/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”176118″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ text_font=”font-113466″ uncode_shortcode_id=”672833″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Specifications &
Interior Selections[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-555555″ text_size=”h4″ text_weight=”400″ text_height=”fontheight-111852″ uncode_shortcode_id=”169557″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Next we need to prepare the detailed documentation required to commence your build. This includes a detailed scope of works and contract specifications.

Our team will guide you through the process of carefully sourcing and selecting every finish and fitting.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_separator sep_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”323519″ sep_color_type=”uncode-palette” el_width=”100″ el_height=”0.25″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”109666″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”153957″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-113466″ text_size=”h4″ uncode_shortcode_id=”177524″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]We Provide[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”2/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”351970″][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”182836″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

  • The opportunity to walk through your home as a digitally projected life size floor plan, helping you to envision the finished product, considering furniture placement, circulation space and distances.
  • The opportunity to make any required design or specification adjustments prior to the commencement of the build.
  • Physical samples of interior finishes and fixtures based on your brief and requirements, be it high performance and longevity, sustainability or luxury.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”50″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-128677″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”202498″ back_color_type=”uncode-palette” row_name=”step04″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”544893″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”109666″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”160638″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-113466″ text_size=”h4″ uncode_shortcode_id=”207772″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Step 04[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”2/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”176118″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ text_font=”font-113466″ uncode_shortcode_id=”153393″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Construct
& Build[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-555555″ text_size=”h4″ text_weight=”400″ text_height=”fontheight-111852″ uncode_shortcode_id=”178786″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]This stage sees your vision and design come into fruition. It is always an exciting part of the journey to see your new home evolve and take shape.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_separator sep_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”323519″ sep_color_type=”uncode-palette” el_width=”100″ el_height=”0.25″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”109666″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”153957″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-113466″ text_size=”h4″ uncode_shortcode_id=”177524″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]We Provide[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”2/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”351970″][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”202399″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

  • A dedicated Project Manager who will work alongside a Site Manager. Together they will address any queries or concerns directly with trades and suppliers, maintain a clean and safe site, and ensure construction is running to plan.
  • Fortnightly updates from your Project Manager from demolition right through to completion.
  • A monthly site meeting to walk you through the progress of your build and share progress.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_single_image media=”294″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”116593″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”50″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-118631″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”171090″ back_color_type=”uncode-palette” row_name=”step05″][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_single_image media=”295″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”163846″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″ uncode_shortcode_id=”544893″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”109666″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”160638″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-113466″ text_size=”h4″ uncode_shortcode_id=”196503″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Step 05[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”2/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”176118″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ text_font=”font-113466″ uncode_shortcode_id=”209117″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Final Inspection
& Handover[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-555555″ text_size=”h4″ text_weight=”400″ text_height=”fontheight-111852″ uncode_shortcode_id=”621404″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]We are almost done – the final step is to complete any finishing touches and walk through your new home together, carefully checking every element to ensure you are 100% satisfied.

Then we can hand you the keys to your new home![/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_separator sep_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”323519″ sep_color_type=”uncode-palette” el_width=”100″ el_height=”0.25″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”109666″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”153957″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-210407″ heading_semantic=”h4″ text_font=”font-113466″ text_size=”h4″ uncode_shortcode_id=”177524″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]We Provide[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”2/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”351970″][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”843595″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

  • An enjoyable and comprehensive handover process that focuses on your satisfaction. Our goal is to achieve zero defects or maintenance issues in your new home.
  • A timely and quality-first approach to any maintenance issues or defect items that do arise, coordinated by a dedicated Maintenance Manager.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][uncode_block id=”73″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
